page.title: SubAgent Orchestration
page.subtitle: The main LLM only chats and delegates; tools live on individual SubAgents.

switches.dedupe: Deduplicate main LLM tools (hide tools duplicated by SubAgents)

description.disabled: When off: SubAgent is disabled; the main LLM mounts tools via persona rules (all by default) and calls them directly.
description.enabled: When on: the main LLM keeps its own tools and mounts transfer_to_* delegate tools. With deduplication, tools overlapping with SubAgents are removed from the main tool set.

cards.previewTitle: Preview: handoff tool shown to the main LLM

form.nameHint: Use lowercase letters + underscores; must be globally unique.
form.providerHint: Leave empty to follow the global default provider.
form.personaHint: The SubAgent inherits the selected Persona's system settings and tools.
form.descriptionLabel: Description for the main LLM (used to decide handoff)
form.descriptionHint: Shown to the main LLM as the transfer_to_* tool descriptionâ€”keep it short and clear.

messages.nameMissing: A SubAgent is missing a name
messages.nameInvalid: Invalid SubAgent name: only lowercase letters/numbers/underscores, starting with a letter
